title: Laboratory-Based Instructional Design Course for In-Service Secondary Teachers' Computer Science Re-Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and pedagogical understanding
context.additional_context: Weekly 3-hour intensive practical sessions + online collaborative task completion

learning_goals: Development of instructional design capabilities utilizing core computer science concepts (algorithms, programming, data structures) in laboratory environments
Acquisition of competency in applying critical thinking-based instructional design principles and evaluating suitability for secondary education settings
Enhanced instructional implementation skills through peer feedback and instructor coaching in blended learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
